TopicTitle: Help!! - My Kerbals disappear after successful landing and vessel recovery

Articles.Content:
KSP Version =  0.1.1.0.21572

Operating System and version  =  Windows 11 Pro - Build 22621.1413

CPU and GPU :    Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-10700F CPU @ 2.90GHz   2.90 GHz - NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060

Description of the bug:  Kerbals do not get reinstated in the VAB after successfully landing and recovering vessel near base.

Expected Behavior - Once vessel is recovered, we would expect to see Kerbals available for the next mission.

Observed Behavior - Kerbals disppear and are nowhere to be found.

Steps to Replicate - Built 'Apollo mission' to Mun, landed on Mun with can based lander.  rendezvous with transfer ship, then returned to Kerbin.  I have completed this same mission twice with the same outcome.  I will try orbit and landing to see if that works ok.  

Fixes / Workarounds (if known..) - None Known

A list of ALL mods - NO MODS USED

Here is a video of the landing, and then a view of the VAB with Jeb, Bob and Val missing.

https://imgur.com/BUk4xQl

https://imgur.com/06AQzHA

NOTE: I also noticed that the transfer vessel while orbiting Mun and waiting for Val to return lost velocity for no reason and was on a collision course with Mun.  I was able to recover from this early enough to avoid an incident.  this error has also been posted elsewhere.
Yep, Known Bug. If you look at the topic between two patches it is supposed to be addressed in the next patch
